fields.text: Thank you for calling Vitagene in San Francisco, where we use your DNA to build a personalized health plan.
To learn about our DNA health plans and testing options, press [INDEX].
For information on ordering a DNA kit, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our DNA testing support team.
To check your test status or view your results, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve your test results.
For help with your existing plan or to speak with a specialist, press [INDEX].
To review your personalized health report, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we fetch your personalized health report.
To schedule a consultation with a health advisor, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a health advisor.
